Description: Limestone ostracon, rectangular, with remains of ten lines of black-painted demotic text on the front, now faded and worn.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (88871) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/88871)
Andrews 2002 / A Memphite miscellany: four new Demotic texts
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
